title: Finding the Product of Two Matrices
body: Use the matrices below to perform the indicated operation if possible.\n$$A=\begin{bmatrix} -1 & 5 \\ 3 & 2 \end{bmatrix}$$, $$B=\begin{bmatrix} 3 & 6 & 4 \\ -8 & 0 & 12 \end{bmatrix}$$, $$C=\begin{bmatrix} 4 & 10 \\ -2 & 6 \\ 5 & 9 \end{bmatrix}$$, $$D=\begin{bmatrix} 2 & -3 & 12 \\ 9 & 3 & 1 \\ 0 & 8 & -10 \end{bmatrix}$$
